alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 9:59PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Butte, northwestern Meade and northeastern Lawrence Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 959 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Haystack Buttes to 9 miles north of Belle Fourche. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Belle Fourche Reservoir around 1010 PM MDT. Belle Fourche and Castle Rock around 1015 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Fruitdale, Newell Lake and Saint Onge. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 19 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Northern Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
